pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, November 28, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.    

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Leader of the Official Opposition Andrew Scheer, Leader of the New Democratic Party Jagmeet Singh, Leader of the Green Party of Canada Elizabeth May, and Interim Leader of the Bloc Québécois Mario Beaulieu to discuss issues facing the Canadian Francophonie.

Prime Minister’s Office
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media: 

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

5:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with His Eminence Cardinal Gérald Lacroix, Archbishop of Quebec.

Closed to media.

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will depart for Buenos Aires, Argentina.

Canada Reception Centre
Macdonald-Cartier International Airport
190 Clear Skies Private

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity of departure
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 4:40 p.m.
